channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Guidance Document on Good In Vitro Method Practices (GIVIMP), Second Edition
item.description: Guidance Document on Good In Vitro Method Practices (GIVIMP), Second Edition by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Monday 15 December 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: Policies for the Future of Farming and Food in Croatia
item.description: Policies for the Future of Farming and Food in Croatia by Trade and Agriculture Directorate has an embargo on Monday 15 December 2025 at 11:00.

item.title: Guidance on Sample Preparation and Dosimetry for Manufactured Nanomaterials, 2025 Edition
item.description: Guidance on Sample Preparation and Dosimetry for Manufactured Nanomaterials, 2025 Edition by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 16 December 2025 at 9:00.

item.title: Pratiques fiscales dommageables – Rapports d’examen par les pairs relatifs à l’échange de renseignements sur les décisions fiscales de 2024 (version abrégée) - Cadre inclusif sur le BEPS : Action 5
